text:
Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Amendment (Muttonbird) Order 2020

I make the following order under section 30(1) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 .

18 March 2020

Guy Barnett

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Amendment (Muttonbird) Order 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Nature Conservation (Open Seasons) Order 2004 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4. Schedule 1 amended (Muttonbird rookeries)
    Schedule 1 to the Principal Order is amended by omitting –
            (a) the heading West Coast Group after item 40; and
            (b) items 41, 42 and 43.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 March 2020

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
